subject: Track and Field
Running
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In a final that was billed as a morality play, Bolt finished one-hundreth of a second ahead of Gatlin, taking his third 100-meter world title.
snippet: In a final that was billed as a morality play, Bolt finished one-hundreth of a second ahead of Gatlin, taking his third 100-meter world title.
